titles.title: A bill to authorize the Cadmus Foundation, Incorporated, to establish a monument on Federal land in the District of Columbia commemorating the ancient Greek teacher Cadmus.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to Subcommittee on Libraries and Memorials.

bill.summary: 9/15/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the Cadmus Foundation, Incorporated, to establish a monument on Federal land in the District of Columbia commemorating the ancient Greek teacher Cadmus as a symbol of all teachers. Prohibits the United States from paying any expense of establishing the monument.
